page.title: 12THE SANDAY BAND
page.content:
{The Sanday Band}is made up of four people - all of one family (Jackie and Christine Wallace, John and Melville) - though only three generally play at any one time. The husband and wife play accordions while one one of their two sons plays drums.
The equipment consists of two {electronic accordions}and a set of "champion drums". These include one snare drum, one foot drum, two high tandems and one floor tandem, a high- hat and one cymbal.
The band{plays}at all{local dances, {weddings}and{small functions}organised by local societies. The band has been {in existence for over thirty years, and for at least twenty of these they have been the only band in the island.
